meanings.definition: The quality or state of being severe.
meanings.sent1: The severeness of the storm caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent2: Her teacher's severeness surprised the students.
meanings.sent3: The severeness of the punishment made everyone gasp.
meanings.sent4: The severeness of the winter cold was unbearable.
meanings.sent5: The severeness of the pain made him wince.

meanings.definition: The condition of being harsh or strict.
meanings.sent1: The severeness of the rules in the school was well-known.
meanings.sent2: His father's severeness sometimes felt overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The severeness of the bedtime rule led to creative excuses.
meanings.sent4: The severeness of the judge's tone made the defendant nervous.
meanings.sent5: The severeness of the consequences kept everyone in line.

meanings.definition: The degree of intensity or seriousness.
meanings.sent1: The severeness of the situation required immediate action.
meanings.sent2: The severeness of the illness took everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent3: The severeness of the competition made her train harder.
